title: SO I BOUGHT BLOODMOON PYKE...

replies.body: Yeah, it actually occurs more than you think. Its not that you didn't unlock the skin or didn't "equip" it, but timing and how fast you chose it could kinda mess things up. Generally just slowing down on the skin selection and picking it before the 5 second mark should let it stick.
